That is just wishful thinking, many games have date checking and still require cracks to work. So I dont think you will get youre wish.

I was just telling people to wait until there is a release posted to a preDB.

preDB's lists scene releases when they come out. (as in before they reach torrent sites) 

I am not saying to use them as a place to download stuff, just to verify a release is genuine.

So if you see something tagged with a group name and it is not a preDB in all likelihood is that it is a fake/trojan/virus.

Patience, you fools. You know that the prerequisite for downloading a P2P is accepting the fact that you will be waiting an indeterminate amount of time for a scene crack. Its nobody's fault but your own for downloading a P2P. Now, stay away from these things and wait for the scene release in the future. In the meantime do your best to avoid downloading these fake cracks unless you feel like your life is missing a few devilish trojans. If you are still desperately overwhelmed with anxiety, now would be a good time to reinstall that old copy of Oblivion or GTA IV and finally finish those things to 100%. Patience = good. Impatience = trojans.

You can play this game without a crack, but you cannot save until one is released. I just verified this and played the first level and a half.

Navigate to:

C:\Program Files (x86)\EA\Bulletstorm\Binaries\Win32

Rename the file:
ShippingPC-StormGame.exe.cat 

to 

ShippingPC-StormGame.exe.cat-backup

Then start the game. You will now be able to play the whole game, but you will not be able to save. You can thank me later. The graphics are great with my 4870x2.
All you have to do is rename one file and the game works, but you cannot save your progress. The game is badass. I can't wait for a proper crack.

1. Install Bulletstorm CloneDVD
2. Make a live account from Windows Live if you donâ€™t already have one.
3. Install the Windows Live Marketplace client from Get the Games for Windows - LIVE Client
4. Search and Download the game Tinker and install it.
5. Start Tinker and login with your live account AND CLICK AUTO SIGN IN!!!!
6. LET LIVE UPDATE IMPORTANT!!!!
7. Once youâ€™ve logged into Tinker and GFWL goes away, close Tinker.
8. Open BulletStorm and GFWL should try and automatically sign-in. When it comes to the CD-Key part to activate Bulletstorm HIT ESCAPE DONT CHECK AGREE AND SIGN IN, HIT ESCAPE!!!
9. Push SPACEBAR, ENTER then SPACEBAR again, it should now take you to the menu!!!

ENJOY!!!!!!!!!!
